chat - package chat
 
chat.client - package chat.client
 
Client - Class in chat.client
The client, at the beginning of its work, should: request from user address and port of the server, connect to the specified address, receive a request name from the server, ask the user name, send the user name to the server, wait for the server to accept the name.
Client() - Constructor for class chat.client.Client
 
Client.SocketThread - Class in chat.client
 
ClientController - Class in chat.client
The controller of the MVC pattern.
ClientController() - Constructor for class chat.client.ClientController
 
ClientController.GuiSocketThread - Class in chat.client
A thread that handles all requests coming from the server on the client side and is responsible for the first acquaintance of the client and the server
clientHandshake() - Method in class chat.client.Client.SocketThread
 
clientHandshake() - Method in class chat.client.ClientController.GuiSocketThread
Handshake between the server and client.
